questions.title: It is forbidden to drive a priority vehicle on emergency service with an alcohol breath alcohol level higher than...
Is overtaking permitted on sections affected by heavy rain?
answers: Overtaking is only allowed at 80 km/hour maximum.

questions.title: Which of these is NOT part of a suspension system?
Which position should be left at a stop on vehicles with automatic gearboxes?
Which of the following characteristics must law enforcement officers meet?
answers: Carry at least two emergency lights

questions.title: Drowsiness can occur while driving and cause an accident...
answers: If you have had little or poor sleep

questions.title: Can a bicycle pull a trailer at night?
answers: Yes, as long as it has the appropriate indication
No, cannot drag it at any time of the day

questions.title: What should a driver who is sleepy do?
answers: Rest as soon as possible in a suitable place
Continue the ride and rest after 2 hours or 200 kilometers

questions.title: Are bicycle riders required to wear protective helmets on urban roads?
answers: It is only mandatory if the driver is under 16 years of age
Yes, it is mandatory for all drivers
No, it is only mandatory on interurban roads

questions.title: Which anti-fog light should you turn on in case of light fog?
answers: Both front and rear fog light

questions.title: Which of the following vehicles can use the shoulder if necessary?
answers: Special vehicles with MAM not exceeding 3500kg
Vehicles less than 1500 kg of MAM

questions.title: How should we perform the reverse maneuver?
answers: Quickly to interfere with traffic as little as possible

questions.title: You are going to turn right, and you signal it with the corresponding direction indicator, until when is it necessary to keep it on?
answers: Until I know for sure that the one who follows me has seen the indication

questions.title: Can the brake pedal and accelerator pedal be used at the same time?
answers: No, because they have opposite purposes
Yes, but only when there is an accident risk

questions.title: If you are driving through a tunnel that is sufficiently illuminated, which lighting should you turn on?
Traffic accidents are one of the main reasons for...
What to do if a rear axle wheel bursts?
answers: Turn sharply to an unoccupied side of the carriageway
Continue with your itinerary until you find a service area

questions.title: This sign prohibits the passage of...
answers: Vehicles whose loaded mass is greater than the indicated mass
Any vehicle whose maximum authorised mass is greater than that indicated

questions.title: Which of the following effects can drugs have on a driver?
answers: Incorrect perception of time and space

questions.title: The economic impact of road traffic accidents affects the...
answers: To all citizens, directly or indirectly
Only to drivers who have an accident when they pay their insurance policy

questions.title: What does the sign indicate?
answers: End of the ban on driving over 50 km/h
Driving speed of at least 50 km/h compulsory

questions.title: What does a solid yellow line on the side of the road indicate?
When you approach a vehicle immobilised on the road, is it compulsory to moderate your speed?
answers: Yes, on all types of public roads

questions.title: How should drivers behave when they encounter a vehicle in emergency service?
answers: Move, normally to the right, and stop, if necessary

questions.title: You have a trailer attached to your car. Do you have to take out compulsory insurance for the trailer?
answers: Yes, but only if the MAM of the trailer exceeds 750 kg
Yes, whatever the MAM of the trailer

questions.title: Are road accidents preventable?
If there is already a car stopped at a stop sign at an intersection, do we need to stop again in our turn?
answers: Yes, we must stop again at the stop sign
No, we must follow the car when it continues without stopping

questions.title: Does using a mobile phone while driving increase the risk of accidents?
answers: Only when you write a message

questions.title: What is one of the fundamental principles in traffic?
When riding a motorbike, is it permitted to wear an unfastened helmet?
answers: Only on urban roads, if the speed is below 40 km/hour
Yes, when it is a full-face helmet
